node.title: For 85 minutes, Kamala Harris held the presidential reins
node.alt: A man with short grey hair shakes hands with a woman with brown hair in front of a row of flags on a green lawn
node.description: Before undergoing an 85-minute colonoscopy, US President Joe Biden transfers his powers to Vice-President, Kamala Harris, which makes her the first woman to hold the presidential reins in the country's history.
node.content:
["US President Joe Biden has briefly transferred power to Vice-President Kamala Harris, as he underwent a colonoscopy, making her the first woman to hold the presidential reins in the country's history.\u00a0", "Mr Biden alerted leaders in Congress of the power transfer at 10:10am Friday morning (local time) and took back control at 11:35am.\u00a0", "Mr Biden was undergoing a routine physical at the Walter Reed military hospital outside Washington.", "White House spokesperson Jen Psaki said Mr Biden spoke to Ms Harris and White House chief of staff, Ron Klain, after the procedure and was \"in good spirits\".", "Mr Biden's power transfer occurred while he was under anaesthesia for the colonoscopy.", "Ms Harris worked from her office in the West Wing of the White House during that time, Ms Psaki said.", "Ms Harris is the first woman to serve as vice-president of the United States \u2014 there has not been a female president in the country's nearly 250-year history.", "Debbie Walsh, the director of the Center for American Women and Politics, said while the moment was historical, it did not count as a woman serving as US president.\u00a0", "But it does reinforce that \"for the first time a woman is the number one person in the line of succession,\" she said.", "The US Constitution's 25th Amendment lays out a process for the president to transfer power when he is unable to discharge his duties.", "Presidential power has been transferred to the vice-president before, when president George W Bush had colonoscopies in 2002 and 2007.", "Mr Biden, who turns 79 this week, is the oldest person to take office as US president, leading to high interest in his health and wellbeing.", "While speculation has persisted about whether he will run for re-election in 2024, he has said he expects to seek a second four-year term.", "Mr Biden has pledged to be more transparent about his health than his predecessor Donald Trump.", "The Republican visited Walter Reed in 2019 for an undisclosed reason, which a former press secretary, Stephanie Grisham, later revealed was for a colonoscopy.", "Mr Trump once had his doctor brief the press about the president's health after questions were raised about his mental acuity.", "Ms Psaki said the White House would release a comprehensive written summary of Mr Biden's physical later on Friday.", "", "
Kamala Harris is sworn in as US Vice-President.
", "Reuters"]
